txt.en: You found a sinister recipe in the kitchen of the goblin cook...in all of your adventures, you have not seen anything quite like it.
You have completed the Sinister Recipe!

This unusual goblin recipe calls for a number of strange plants that grow in the area. Though you have no urge to sample goblin-cooking, there is something about this recipe that nags at you, and you wonder if it might prove useful in some manner.
The ingredients can be found throughout western Nan Curunír.\n\nYou are enticed to collect the ingredients for the sinister recipe and discover what it creates.

'What strange draught do you have there? It looks vile...let me have a sniff....'

Ondor's face blanches as he catches the odour.

'What manner of poison is this? Let me see that recipe....'

'A spice? What madman created this? It would fell an ox if you could get one to taste it.'
Ondor is encamped near the caves of western Nan Curunír.\n\nYou should bring the sinister recipe to Ondor and ask his opinion of the vile brew.
Bring the Sinister Recipe to Ondor and ask his opinion of the vile brew.
Bring the sinister recipe to Ondor in Nan Curunír
